title: [SOLVED]820-00165 shuts off when you unplug magsafe
message:
Hello everyone, i got a macbook air a1466 820-00165 that when you unplug the magsafe charger it automatically shuts off. I can see a charging logo at the top of the screen and a orange light at the magsafe. Anyone knows what can be causing this issue? during visual inspection i noticed a Corroded D7005 and missing resistor r7006 near the wifi card. could this be my root cause or its a faulty isl chip?
Thanks!

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 shuts off when you unplug magsafe
message: I would say there is no 3V42 on the battery, missing R7006 would certainly cause that.

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 shuts off when you unplug magsafe
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 25555"]I would say there is no 3V42 on the battery, missing R7006 would certainly cause that.[/QUOTE]

Thanks dukes R7006 addressed the issue.
